name: 完蛋我被OX包围了
description:
"Oops, I'm Surrounded by OX!" is a first-person light-hearted visual novel game. In "Stellar Campus," you will play as a high school student, embarking on a wonderful journey with three beautiful girls, experiencing light-hearted and pleasant storylines and encounters.

Gameplay:
Playing is as simple as using the mouse to progress through the story and making choices at key points to experience different storylines.


Characters:
Three different girls with unique personalities will embark on adventures with you. Choose one of them and experience different storylines.
